snippet: The United Nations human rights agency is looking at the circumstances behind the continued incarceration of Amir Hekmati, who has not been charged.
abstract: Family of Amir Hekmati, former American Marine who has been incarcerated in Iran for more than two years, has been contacted by the United Nations for details on his case; Iranian government has not explained why it continues to hold Hekmati despite fact that his espionage conviction was overturned.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations human rights agency is looking at the circumstances behind the continued incarceration of Amir Hekmati, who has not been charged.

headline.main: U.N. Agency Seeks Details on American Held in Iran
headline.print_headline: U.N. Agency Seeks Details On American Held in Iran
